translations: [无化] 次氯酸盐；低氧化氯

sentences.sentence: Sodium hypochlorite generator can be divided into seawater system and brine system according to the material.
sentences.translation: 次氯酸钠发生器系统从原料的角度，可分为盐水系统和海水系统。

sentences.sentence: We now dissolve everything in a mixture of hydrochloric acid at 35% and chlorine bleach (sodium hypochlorite) at 5%, in a proportion of 2 to 1.
sentences.translation: 现在我们用35%的盐酸和5%的漂白剂(次氯酸钠)把所有金属溶解。盐酸和次氯酸钠的比例为2：1。

sentences.sentence: If you can't boil water, you can treat water with chlorine tablets, iodine tablets, or unscented household chlorine bleach (5.25% sodium hypochlorite).
sentences.translation: 如果你不能将食水煮沸，你可以用氯片、碘片、或无气味家用含氯漂白剂(5.25%次氯酸钠)处理食水。
